description.string: A plugin to for advanced notification processing.

Specifies which events trigger notifications. Remove the event type(s) you do not want to get notified on. This setting overrides device-specific settings in the UI. (CTRL + Click to select/deselect).

Spezifiziert, bei welchen Events Benachrichtigungen versendet werden. Entfernen Sie die Eventtypen, bei welchen Sie nicht benachrichtigt werden wollen. Diese Einstellung überschreibt gerätespezifische Einstellungen im UI. (STRG + klicken zum aus-/abwählen).

Especifica que eventos envían notificaciones. Elimina los tipos de eventos de los que no quieras recibir notificaciones. Este ajuste sobreescribe los ajustes específicos de los dispositivos en la interfaz. (CTRL + Clic para seleccionar / deseleccionar).
After how many minutes a device is reported as down and a notification is sent.

You can specify a SQL where condition to filter out New Devices from notifications. For example AND dev_LastIP NOT LIKE '192.168.3.%' will always exlude New Device notifications for all devices with the IP starting with 192.168.3.%.

You can specify a SQL where condition to filter out Events from notifications. For example AND dev_LastIP NOT LIKE '192.168.3.%' will always exlude New Device notifications for all devices with the IP starting with 192.168.3.%.
